lines.text:
[explaining why he thinks he was kidnapped]
I'm a special imvestigator from the Cattleeman's Associaton. They wanted probably to impersonate me.

[making clear his intentions to do just that]
Thay sounds like a smart idea. I never likr to pass 'em up when they're smart.
What kind of game is up with you?
I like dealer's choice when I have my deal.

[to Red, whom he has just beaten to the ground]
Now, if you move away from here and I'll kick your teeth right down your throat.

[disguiesed as an investigatotor from the Cattlemaen's Association]
I don'r see any signs of a badge on you anywhere.

[as the Rough Rders ride away]
Oh, gee, Ma! Aren't they swell?
They don't come any better, anywhere in the land.

[to Red, whom he has just beaten to the ground]
Now, if you move away from here and I'll kick your teeth right down your throat.

[disguiesed as an investigatotor from the Cattlemaen's Association]
I don'r see any signs of a badge on you anywhere.

[as the Rough Rders ride away]
Oh, gee, Ma! Aren't they swell?
They don't come any better - anywhere in the land.
